descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: A platform for corporate wide communications is needed, as employees are hindered with daily business communications and there is a chance of missing corporate communications in the flood of emails. A better communication channel, Microsoft Teams, will allow them to get focused communication and act on it.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
The Company Communicator customization enables corporate teams to create, schedule and send messages intended for multiple teams or large number of employees (using DLs) over Teams Channels and personal chat allowing organization to reach employees right where they collaborate.

This solution can be used for multiple scenarios such as targeted communications, employee onboarding, modern learning and development or organization-wide broadcasts.

The solution provides an easy interface for designated users to create, preview, collaborate, schedule and send messages. Extended custom functionality allows authors to edit and delete sent messages, also provides extended telemetry like user reactions to messages.

Customizations also provides options to create multiple BU specific groups and assign admins to those groups. This will allow Group Admin to send targeted communications for the selected groups/DLs for which they are allowed to.
